title: Store of the Future
credits: As part of Random Studio (client NDA)
lede: 2+ years of continuous discovery, design, and launch of the new features for a global digital retail platform that spans 350+ stores in Europe.

text.heading: Insight
text.text: The pandemic has accelerated the shift to digital shopping, yet stores continue to be a crucial part of the omnichannel consumer journey. In a retail environment where clients often arrive with specific requests after browsing online, store associates need efficient tools to effectively turn conversations into successful sales interactions.

text.heading: Idea
text.text: Since joining as a Digital Experience designer, I've been part of The Store of the Future program, an innovation initiative that has played a key role in keeping the client at the forefront of integrating digital tools into physical stores. Our focus shifted from customer-facing interfaces to empowering store associates across the retail journey, ranging from shop floor automation to RFID integration, to loyalty program development.
